item.title: New Features and Beta Test
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I've added "Most Popular Blogs" to Blog Buzz Machine, it features (duh) the most popular blogs in the Blog Buzz Machine universe. I currently have folks beta testing some of the other neat features of Blog Buzz Machine. Want to be added to the beta test? Email me at brian.kirsten.bss@gmail.com to join the Beta test team.
